transArray.content: The location of the hotel is very good. It is Qianmen Street when you go out, so I didn't book breakfast at the hotel. I wanted to solve it on Qianmen Street, but Qianmen Street doesn't open so early, so I can walk to Exit C of Zhushikou Subway Station. There is a KFC there. The hotel is generally It is relatively clean, spraying what kind of perfume makes people feel very relaxed and happy
